sourcesContent:
import { VocabTopic } from '../data/Vocab';

export const vocabTopics: VocabTopic[] = [
    {
        id: 'contract',
        name: 'Contract',
        description: 'Vocabulary related to contracts and agreements',
        words: [
          {
            id: 'contract_1',
            word: "Contract",
            pronunciation: "/ˈkɒntrækt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Hợp đồng",
            example: "We need to sign the contract before starting the project."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_2',
            word: "Agreement",
            pronunciation: "/əˈɡriːmənt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Thỏa thuận",
            example: "The two companies have reached an agreement."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_3',
            word: "Term",
            pronunciation: "/tɜːm/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Điều khoản",
            example: "The term of the contract is for two years."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_4',
            word: "Sign",
            pronunciation: "/saɪn/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Ký",
            example: "Please sign the contract to confirm your agreement."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_5',
            word: "Clause",
            pronunciation: "/klɔːz/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Điều khoản",
            example: "This clause says the contract can be canceled at any time."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_6',
            word: "Condition",
            pronunciation: "/kənˈdɪʃən/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Điều kiện",
            example: "There is a condition that payment must be made within 30 days."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_7',
            word: "Party",
            pronunciation: "/ˈpɑːti/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Bên (trong hợp đồng)",
            example: "Both parties must agree to the terms of the contract."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_8',
            word: "Cancel",
            pronunciation: "/ˈkænsl/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Hủy bỏ",
            example: "We had to cancel the contract because of a misunderstanding."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_9',
            word: "Pay",
            pronunciation: "/peɪ/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Thanh toán",
            example: "The company will pay the agreed amount on time."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_10',
            word: "Renew",
            pronunciation: "/rɪˈnjuːəl/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Gia hạn",
            example: "They decided to renew the contract for another year."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_11',
            word: "Offer",
            pronunciation: "/ˈɒfə/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Lời đề nghị",
            example: "The company made an offer to extend the contract."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_12',
            word: "Binding",
            pronunciation: "/ˈbaɪndɪŋ/",
            partOfSpeech: "adjective",
            vietnamese: "Ràng buộc",
            example: "This agreement is binding and cannot be changed without permission."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_13',
            word: "Legal",
            pronunciation: "/ˈliːɡəl/",
            partOfSpeech: "adjective",
            vietnamese: "Hợp pháp",
            example: "The contract must be legal and follow all local laws."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_14',
            word: "Break",
            pronunciation: "/breɪk/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Vi phạm, phá vỡ hợp đồng",
            example: "If you break the contract, there will be penalties."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_15',
            word: "Change",
            pronunciation: "/ʧeɪndʒ/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Thay đổi",
            example: "You need to get approval before changing the terms of the contract."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_16',
            word: "Deadline",
            pronunciation: "/ˈdɛdlaɪn/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Hạn chót",
            example: "The deadline for signing the contract is next week."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_17',
            word: "Terminate",
            pronunciation: "/ˈtɜːmɪneɪt/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Chấm dứt hợp đồng",
            example: "You can terminate the contract if you give 30 days' notice."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_18',
            word: "Payment",
            pronunciation: "/ˈpeɪmənt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Thanh toán",
            example: "The payment will be made once the work is completed."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_19',
            word: "Dispute",
            pronunciation: "/dɪsˈpjuːt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Tranh chấp",
            example: "There was a dispute about the payment terms of the contract."
          },
          {
            id: 'contract_20',
            word: "Witness",
            pronunciation: "/ˈwɪtnɪs/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Người chứng kiến",
            example: "A witness must sign the contract to confirm it was signed by both parties."
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        id: 'office',
        name: 'Office',
        description: 'Vocabulary related to office environments',
        words: [
          {
            id: 'office_1',
            word: "Office",
            pronunciation: "/ˈɒfɪs/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Văn phòng",
            example: "I work in an office downtown."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_2',
            word: "Desk",
            pronunciation: "/dɛsk/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Bàn làm việc",
            example: "My desk is next to the window."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_3',
            word: "Chair",
            pronunciation: "/ʧɛər/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Ghế",
            example: "Please sit in the chair by the door."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_4',
            word: "Computer",
            pronunciation: "/kəmˈpjuːtə/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Máy tính",
            example: "I need to fix the computer in the office."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_5',
            word: "Email",
            pronunciation: "/ˈiːmeɪl/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Thư điện tử",
            example: "I sent the report by email yesterday."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_6',
            word: "File",
            pronunciation: "/faɪl/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Hồ sơ, tài liệu",
            example: "Please put the files on my desk."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_7',
            word: "Meeting",
            pronunciation: "/ˈmiːtɪŋ/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Cuộc họp",
            example: "We have a meeting at 3 p.m. today."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_8',
            word: "Document",
            pronunciation: "/ˈdɒkjʊmənt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Tài liệu",
            example: "I need to print out the document for the meeting."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_9',
            word: "Phone",
            pronunciation: "/fəʊn/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Điện thoại",
            example: "The phone rang during the meeting."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_10',
            word: "Call",
            pronunciation: "/kɔːl/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Gọi",
            example: "I will call the client later this afternoon."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_11',
            word: "Schedule",
            pronunciation: "/ˈskɛdʒuːl/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Lên lịch, sắp xếp",
            example: "Please schedule the meeting for next Monday."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_12',
            word: "Copy",
            pronunciation: "/ˈkɒpi/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Bản sao",
            example: "Can you make a copy of this report?"
          },
          {
            id: 'office_13',
            word: "Printer",
            pronunciation: "/ˈprɪntə/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Máy in",
            example: "The printer is not working; please check it."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_14',
            word: "Report",
            pronunciation: "/rɪˈpɔːt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Báo cáo",
            example: "I need to finish the report by tomorrow."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_15',
            word: "Folder",
            pronunciation: "/ˈfəʊldə/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Túi đựng tài liệu",
            example: "Put the folder on my desk when you're done."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_16',
            word: "Team",
            pronunciation: "/tiːm/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Đội nhóm, nhóm",
            example: "Our team will work on the project next week."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_17',
            word: "Appointment",
            pronunciation: "/əˈpɔɪntmənt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Cuộc hẹn",
            example: "I have an appointment with the manager at 2 p.m."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_18',
            word: "Assistant",
            pronunciation: "/əˈsɪstənt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Trợ lý",
            example: "She is the assistant to the director of the company."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_19',
            word: "Task",
            pronunciation: "/tɑːsk/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Nhiệm vụ",
            example: "I have a task to complete by the end of the day."
          },
          {
            id: 'office_20',
            word: "Meeting",
            pronunciation: "/ˈmiːtɪŋ/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Cuộc họp",
            example: "The meeting will start in 15 minutes."
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        id: 'marketing',
        name: 'Marketing',
        description: 'Vocabulary related to marketing and sales',
        words: [
          {
            id: 'marketing_1',
            word: "Market",
            pronunciation: "/ˈmɑːrkɪt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Thị trường",
            example: "The company is expanding its market overseas."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_2',
            word: "Product",
            pronunciation: "/ˈprɒdʌkt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Sản phẩm",
            example: "This product is very popular among young people."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_3',
            word: "Sell",
            pronunciation: "/sɛl/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Bán",
            example: "The company sells products online and in stores."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_4',
            word: "Advertise",
            pronunciation: "/ˈædvətaɪz/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Quảng cáo",
            example: "We will advertise our new product next month."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_5',
            word: "Customer",
            pronunciation: "/ˈkʌstəmər/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Khách hàng",
            example: "We need to understand our customers' needs better."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_6',
            word: "Brand",
            pronunciation: "/brænd/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Thương hiệu",
            example: "The brand has been in the market for 10 years."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_7',
            word: "Strategy",
            pronunciation: "/ˈstrætədʒi/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Chiến lược",
            example: "The marketing strategy focuses on social media."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_8',
            word: "Campaign",
            pronunciation: "/kæmˈpeɪn/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Chiến dịch",
            example: "The new marketing campaign was successful."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_9',
            word: "Price",
            pronunciation: "/praɪs/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Giá",
            example: "We need to check the price before making a decision."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_10',
            word: "Target",
            pronunciation: "/ˈtɑːɡɪt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Mục tiêu",
            example: "Our target is to reach 1,000 new customers by the end of the year."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_11',
            word: "Promotion",
            pronunciation: "/prəˈməʊʃən/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Khuyến mãi",
            example: "The company is running a promotion this weekend."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_12',
            word: "Reach",
            pronunciation: "/riːʧ/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Tiếp cận",
            example: "The ad reached a wide audience online."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_13',
            word: "Sales",
            pronunciation: "/seɪlz/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Doanh thu",
            example: "The sales of the product increased last month."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_14',
            word: "Launch",
            pronunciation: "/lɔːntʃ/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Ra mắt",
            example: "The company will launch the new phone next week."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_15',
            word: "Discount",
            pronunciation: "/ˈdɪskaʊnt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Giảm giá",
            example: "Customers can get a 20% discount on all products."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_16',
            word: "Research",
            pronunciation: "/rɪˈsɜːrtʃ/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Nghiên cứu",
            example: "We are conducting research to understand consumer behavior."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_17',
            word: "Competitor",
            pronunciation: "/kəmˈpɛtɪtə/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Đối thủ cạnh tranh",
            example: "The new competitor offers lower prices than us."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_18',
            word: "Audience",
            pronunciation: "/ˈɔːdiəns/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Khán giả, đối tượng khách hàng",
            example: "The audience for this advertisement is young adults."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_19',
            word: "Media",
            pronunciation: "/ˈmiːdiə/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Phương tiện truyền thông",
            example: "The media plays an important role in advertising."
          },
          {
            id: 'marketing_20',
            word: "Influence",
            pronunciation: "/ˈɪnfluəns/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Ảnh hưởng",
            example: "Social media has a big influence on modern marketing."
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        id: 'computer',
        name: 'Computer',
        description: 'Vocabulary related to computers and technology',
        words: [
          {
            id: 'computer_1',
            word: "Computer",
            pronunciation: "/kəmˈpjuːtə/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Máy tính",
            example: "I use my computer to work every day."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_2',
            word: "Screen",
            pronunciation: "/skriːn/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Màn hình",
            example: "The screen is too bright; I need to adjust it."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_3',
            word: "Keyboard",
            pronunciation: "/ˈkiːbɔːd/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Bàn phím",
            example: "The keyboard is not working properly."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_4',
            word: "Mouse",
            pronunciation: "/maʊs/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Chuột",
            example: "I need a new mouse for my computer."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_5',
            word: "Software",
            pronunciation: "/ˈsɒftwɛə/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Phần mềm",
            example: "The software is updating automatically."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_6',
            word: "Hardware",
            pronunciation: "/ˈhɑːdweə/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Phần cứng",
            example: "The computer's hardware needs to be upgraded."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_7',
            word: "File",
            pronunciation: "/faɪl/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Tệp",
            example: "I cannot find the file on my computer."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_8',
            word: "Program",
            pronunciation: "/ˈprəʊɡræm/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Chương trình",
            example: "This program helps you manage your documents easily."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_9',
            word: "Network",
            pronunciation: "/ˈnɛtwɜːk/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Mạng",
            example: "The network is down, so I can't access the internet."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_10',
            word: "Website",
            pronunciation: "/ˈwɛbsaɪt/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Trang web",
            example: "I visited the company's website for more information."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_11',
            word: "Download",
            pronunciation: "/ˈdaʊnˌləʊd/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Tải xuống",
            example: "Please download the file from the website."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_12',
            word: "Upload",
            pronunciation: "/ˈʌpˌləʊd/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Tải lên",
            example: "I need to upload the document to the server."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_13',
            word: "Browser",
            pronunciation: "/ˈbraʊzə/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Trình duyệt",
            example: "I use Google Chrome as my browser."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_14',
            word: "Application",
            pronunciation: "/ˌæplɪˈkeɪʃən/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Ứng dụng",
            example: "This application helps me track my tasks."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_15',
            word: "Virus",
            pronunciation: "/ˈvaɪrəs/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Vi-rút",
            example: "My computer got infected with a virus, so I need to fix it."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_16',
            word: "Search",
            pronunciation: "/sɜːʧ/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Tìm kiếm",
            example: "I will search for the information on the internet."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_17',
            word: "Update",
            pronunciation: "/ˈʌpˌdeɪt/",
            partOfSpeech: "verb",
            vietnamese: "Cập nhật",
            example: "Don't forget to update your computer regularly."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_18',
            word: "System",
            pronunciation: "/ˈsɪstəm/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Hệ thống",
            example: "The computer system is running smoothly now."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_19',
            word: "Security",
            pronunciation: "/sɪˈkjʊərɪti/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Bảo mật",
            example: "You need to update your security settings to protect your data."
          },
          {
            id: 'computer_20',
            word: "Password",
            pronunciation: "/ˈpɑːswɜːd/",
            partOfSpeech: "noun",
            vietnamese: "Mật khẩu",
            example: "Please enter your password to log into the system."
          }
        ]
      }
]

export const getVocabByTopic = (topicId: string): VocabTopic | undefined => {
  return vocabTopics.find(topic => topic.id === topicId);
};

export const getAllTopics = (): VocabTopic[] => {
  return vocabTopics;
};
